responses: 2: The ruling party or party leadership body (in a one-party system). (0=No, 1=Yes)[v2exrmhsol_2]
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Which of the following bodies would be likely to succeed in removing the head of state if it took actions (short of military force) to do so?
name: v2exrmhsol
